plot: A photographer and 5 models are confined to the studio without knowing why. They lost the water, foods, a light, and their calm. But they know that there is a important thing than their life.
title: 5 + Camera
plot_es: A photographer and 5 models are confined to the studio without knowing why. They lost the water, foods, a light, and their calm. But they know that there is a important thing than their life.
plot_en: A photographer and 5 models are confined to the studio without knowing why. They lost the water, foods, a light, and their calm. But they know that there is a important thing than their life.
